com.martensigwart.fakeload

Class FakeLoadBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martensigwart.fakeload.FakeLoadBuilder

  • public final class FakeLoadBuilder
extends Object
    A FakeLoad builder. Can be used as convenient tool to create FakeLoad instances more efficiently.

    Both implementations of the FakeLoad interface, SimpleFakeLoad and CompositeFakeLoad are immutable classes. Therefore using the provided fluent interface to set load parameters a new instance is created on every call. Using the builder, especially bigger FakeLoad instances can be created more efficiently.

    Since:
    1.8
    Author:
    Marten Sigwart
